name: Deep Inside (BattleCroissant)
description:
Deep Inside is a game about exploring the deeps of an oceanic cavern. You will have to manage your oxygen to go as far as you can in your journey!

Receiving damage or using your propellers will use oxygen, so don't waste your resources!!!

Controlls:

- Up arrow: Activate frontside propellers.

- Down arrow: Activate backside propellers.

- Left arrow: Activate leftside propellers.

- Right arrow: Activate rightside  propellers.

-Enter: Pause the game
